## removeTagsWithContent() function

Removes the provided XML tags from the provided speech.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeTagsWithContent(speech: string, tags: string[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  speech | string | A string to have the tags |
|  tags | string\[\] | The names of the tags such as "speak" |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
